rule: The output can be in any language.
input: En lille pige læser en bog under et træ i gyldent solskin om efteråret. Scene bør føles lærerig og fredelig.
output: A small girl with curly brown hair reads a book under a tree with golden autumn leaves, warm sunlight casting a cozy glow on her face, surrounded by a serene natural background, evoking feelings of peaceful learning and tranquility.
complianceText:
This output describes a single subject (a small girl with curly brown hair) and her activity (reading a book under a tree). It details the timing (under a tree with golden autumn leaves) and lighting (warm sunlight casting a cozy glow on her face), describes the background (surrounded by a serene natural background), and conveys the feeling it should evoke (feelings of peaceful learning and tranquility). It is crafted in a single paragraph and does not exceed 80 words.

OK
